title: haNNu bandide koLLirO
sahitya:
haNNu bandide koLLirO nIvIga cenna bAlakrSNanembo kanne bALe


caraNam 1    havya kavyada haNNu saviva sakkare haNNu bhavarOgagaLanella kaLeva haNNu 
navanIta cOranembo javana anjiya haNNu avaniyoLu shrI rAmanembo haNNu
    caraNam 2    koLedu hOguvudalla huLudu hOguvadalla kaLedu bIDisi koLLuvudalla 
aLade kombuvadalla giLi kacci timbodalla oLitAda hariyembo mAvina haNNu
    caraNam 3    keTTu nAruvudalla bitti beLeyOdalla kaSTadi haNa koTTu kombuvadalla 
shrSTiyoLage namma purandra viTTala krSNarAyanembo shrESTAda haNNu
